## Logistic Function
```{r}
logistic <- function(x){
  (exp(x))/(1 + (exp(x)))
}

logistic(2)
```

## Linear Combinations
```{r}
linear_combine <- function(data, coefs){
  dnm = names(data)
  result <- 0
for (nm in names(coefs)) {
  if (!(nm %in% names(data))) {
     stop("doesn't contain variable")
  }
  else if (nm == "intercept") {
    result <- result + coefs[[nm]]
  } else {
    result <- result + coefs[[nm]] * data[[nm]]
  }
}
  result
}

names(Default)
  

#linear_combine(data = Default, 
 #              coefs = c(intercept = 3, balance = 0.00001, income = -0.0002))
```
